message: Updated introductory description to reflect current occupation and career and give it prominence over avocations.
Included omitted reviews for a more balanced perspective.
Reordered description so full-time employment is listed first. Added heading for avocations to differentiate from career.

Corrected misleading description which led readers to believe subject is a novelist rather than working full-time for a tech company. Also, added qualifier regarding introduction to Dickens because the claim cannot be verified independently.
Deleted childhood claim. Subject is the source.

Demoted extraneous information about job at a software company. The rationale for this page would seem to be that Varese is a public figure through his role as a novelist, to which outside careers would seem to have only minute and transitory relevance. Also removed the idiosyncratically suspicious phrasing of 'Varese claimed in an interview' since this wording wrongly implies that the novelist's quite believable claim is under some sort of suspicion.
Updated introductory description to reflect current occupation and career and give it prominence over avocations.
